name: MalariaTestsForPlasmodiumSpeciesAntigen
title: Malaria (Tests for Plasmodium species Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Plasmodium species Ag),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Plasmodium Ag/ Plasmodium sp lactate dehydrogenase),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
